question: Which of the following is an example of heat transfer by conduction?
candidate_answers: (A) a whole metal spoon getting hot when one end is in hot soup (B) the inside of a car in the sun getting very hot (C) a tar road getting hotter in the sun than a concrete sidewalk (D) a fireplace fire heating a room on a cold day
answer: a fireplace fire heating a room on a cold day
label: D
